thread.title: W Hotels Worldwide to debut in Egypt
thread.title_full: W Hotels Worldwide to debut in Egypt

author: eTN Global Editor
title: W Hotels Worldwide to debut in Egypt
text:
W Hotels Worldwide to debut in Egypt   
Oct 08, 2015 eTN   
NEW YORK, NY - Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc today announced that it will launch the iconic W Hotels brand in Egypt in 2020 with the opening of W Sharm El Sheikh and The Residences at W Sharm El Sheikh. Owned by Tower Prestige for Hotels SAE, the hotel will be located in the resort town of Sharm El Sheikh. 
“Starwood’s lifestyle brands are gaining traction with developers and guests in Africa. We are excited to build a long-term relationship with Tower Prestige for Hotels SAE to bring W Hotels and its dynamic DNA to the Red Sea and are confident that W Sharm El Sheikh will become the number one choice for design-conscious local and international guests in the region,” said Michael Wale, President, Starwood Hotels & Resorts, Europe, Africa and Middle East.
